thag2.16:1.1: There’s a big black woman who looks like a crow.
thag2.16:1.2: She broke off thigh-bones, first one then another;
thag2.16:1.3: she broke off arm-bones, first one then another;
thag2.16:1.4: she broke off a skull like a curd-bowl, and then
thag2.16:2.1: When an ignorant person builds up attachments,
thag2.16:2.2: that idiot returns to suffering again and again.
thag2.16:2.3: So let one who understands not build up attachments:
thag2.16:2.4: may I never again lie with a broken skull!
